Tokyo ✕ Hakuba
legendary powder & onsen
hero.lead:
Explore Tokyo — temples, iconic districts and world‑class cuisine — then ski in Hakuba and discover its legendary powder in the 1998 Olympic resorts.
Personalized guidance by Jérôme Noviant (30 years’ experience in Japan).
